thread.title: Supermarket Chain Sells Out of Trump Wine After Liberals Try to Boycott It
thread.title_full: Supermarket Chain Sells Out of Trump Wine After Liberals Try to Boycott It

author: Kim Smith
title: Supermarket Chain Sells Out of Trump Wine After Liberals Try to Boycott It
text:
The grocery retailer’s eight other stores in Virginia have also either sold out some or all of the Trump Winery varieties, Wegmans media relations vice president Jo Natale said. 
She said the supplies would be replenished when more of the products became available. 
“Our role as a retailer is to offer choice to our customers,” Natale said. Advertisement –   
“For various reasons, we are sometimes asked to stop selling a product. Our response is always the same, no matter the product: How a product performs is our single measure for what stays on our shelves and what goes,” she said. 
Good for them for not backing down. Many people on social media showed support for the company. I support @Wegmans for keeping Trump Wine on the shelves, because banning products is stupid and it doesn't work. Don't give IN! 
— Kate Todd (@KateToddPhoto) February 15, 2017 AWESOME!! When will the LEFT figure out that AMERICA is sick of their BULLYING tactics & that they will NOT succeed! https://t.co/ihCI8AM5UU 
— Jim Childs (@JimChilds10) February 20, 2017 
Fox News reported that it could take three to four weeks for more of the wine to be available. Advertisement -
